pages.text: $(marked)Leonard$() is the patron of witches, brewing $(o)and$()...$(br2)Leonard is a Greater Demon; he can be pledged to.$(br)Witches pledged to Leonard are known to brew potent potions.$(br)Pledging to Leonard also allows to $(l:bewitchment:tools/cauldron#teleport)warp$() with Cauldrons without using any ME.
